          Starts playing a medium in a random order of the elements by creating a randomized XSPF-Playlist

Next Item of the VLC playlist

void previous()
Previous Item in playlist

toggleFullscreen

void toggleFullscreen()
If fullscreen is not enabled this will enable it. Otherwise if enabled it will disable the fullscreen

updateVLCConnection

void updateVLCConnection(java.lang.String path,
                         int port)
If the path to VLC has changed, this method can be called. It will start an instance of VLC with the new path and the new port.
